name: Solmec: Hollow Planet
description: Solmec: Hollow Planet is an adventure game where you play as Soledad, a lone Solmec warrior exploring an ancient, lost planet. His task is to find a cure for the Rot that is killing the Ankazil â€“ spacefaring beasts that are home to the Solmec.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP or Higher Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 254 MB available space
